Pod::Perldoc(3pm) Perl Programmers Reference Guide Pod::Perldoc(3pm)

NAME

Pod::Perldoc - Look up Perl documentation in Pod format.

SYNOPSIS

    use Pod::Perldoc ();

    Pod::Perldoc->run();

DESCRIPTION

The guts of perldoc utility.

SEE ALSO

perldoc
